reviewText: Great movie.  Paul Douglas is a superb actor, and the storyline is fantastic. A true family movie.
I purchase tis movie to show at the assisted living home my father lived at they all loved it
I really like Paul Douglas, and this movie is so  cute and funny!  The little 'gangster' kid is hilarious!  So glad they finally got this out on DVD!
Not the greatest, but a very enjoyable comedy with a great cast, including the wonderfully wacky Joan Davis. It's just a good, breezy, bright feel good comedy. And not a bad black and white print.
